problem.script: answerchoice=random.randrange(0,2,1) objects=["solid disk","solid sphere","spherical shell"] answers=["sqrt(4/3*g*a)","sqrt(10/7*g*a)","sqrt(6/5*g*a)"] object=objects[answerchoice] answer=answers[answerchoice]
problem.p:
A $object of radius R rolls without slipping on a parabola given by y=a*(x)2.
What is the angular velocity of the $object for small oscillations? (Use g for the gravitational constant.)
